short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create your own list of favorite repositories

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension you get a "Favorites" button on every repository page. You can add and delete a repository from your personal favorites list at any time.

A list with your favorites can be found on the dashboard page at GitHub.

For more infos and bug reports please visit the public GitHub-Repository. Feel free to contribute!
https://github.com/emha/chrome-github-favorites
